name: Intergalactic Buffet - 20.06.2021 (Unity Build)
description: This is a fully playable version of Intergalactic Buffet, all be it a bit rough and missing some key features. Hopefully I can continue to add to this project over the coming month to polish it off and get it ready for the London show near the end of July 2021! I hope you enjoy playing my game :)
